attributes.action: abolish Sunday opening of large retail outlets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sunday opening of shops has helped diminish family life.  So many families have a member forced to work on Sundays thereby making it impossible to get the family together for a meal, day out or visit to relatives.  Family life has been eroded in so many ways; banning Sunday opening is just one small step towards re-establishing family values.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
